body_html:
The faulty values for the grid sizes are caused by a device not being initalized (but passed to the TensorExecutor). Can be fixed with the attached patch to the TensorExecutor.

Apply from tensorflow base directory:
patch ./bazel-tensorflow/external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/src/Tensor/TensorExecutor.h < patch.txt

Should fix this issue for now.
patch.txt

patch.txt
body:
The faulty values for the grid sizes are caused by a device not being initalized (but passed to the TensorExecutor). Can be fixed with the attached patch to the TensorExecutor.

Apply from tensorflow base directory:
`patch ./bazel-tensorflow/external/eigen_archive/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/src/Tensor/TensorExecutor.h < patch.txt`

Should fix this issue for now.
[patch.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/473783/patch.txt)
